html: It would allow military spouses to end home and auto leases if their spouse is catastrophically injured while serving. Military families should be able to make decisions on whether to return home, move somewhere to receive care or make other decisions without financial burdens.
text: It would allow military spouses to end home and auto leases if their spouse is catastrophically injured while serving. Military families should be able to make decisions on whether to return home, move somewhere to receive care or make other decisions without financial burdens.

html: Now, as we look towards improving the law, I want to take a moment to highlight some stories of the folks from our district whose lives have been impacted by the ACA.
text: Now, as we look towards improving the law, I want to take a moment to highlight some stories of the folks from our district whose lives have been impacted by the ACA.

html: The ACA expanded Medicaid, helped rural hospitals and protected consumers – but it also allowed folks to stay on their parent’s health insurance until they’re 26. That’s huge.
text: The ACA expanded Medicaid, helped rural hospitals and protected consumers – but it also allowed folks to stay on their parent’s health insurance until they’re 26. That’s huge.

html: Today is the 9th anniversary of the Affordable Care Act. Before the ACA’s passage, rising health care costs had no end in sight and folks could get kicked off or denied health insurance for having a pre-existing condition like cancer, asthma or diabetes.
text: Today is the 9th anniversary of the Affordable Care Act. Before the ACA’s passage, rising health care costs had no end in sight and folks could get kicked off or denied health insurance for having a pre-existing condition like cancer, asthma or diabetes.

html: With the president’s threats to slash crop insurance by over $25 billion and massive cuts to the USDA budget, I’m going to keep fighting to protect our farms from these partisan attacks.
text: With the president’s threats to slash crop insurance by over $25 billion and massive cuts to the USDA budget, I’m going to keep fighting to protect our farms from these partisan attacks.

html: Last year I worked hard to write and pass a bipartisan Farm Bill to give our producers the stability and certainty they need to succeed.
text: Last year I worked hard to write and pass a bipartisan Farm Bill to give our producers the stability and certainty they need to succeed.

html: Even with Illinois leading the nation in soybean production and second in corn production, our agricultural economy is facing tough times.
text: Even with Illinois leading the nation in soybean production and second in corn production, our agricultural economy is facing tough times.

html: Our farmers now each feed three times the amount of people they did in 1950, yet we’re still facing some of our biggest challenges in farm country.
text: Our farmers now each feed three times the amount of people they did in 1950, yet we’re still facing some of our biggest challenges in farm country.

html: Put simply, leaders don’t just shut down the government or declare a national emergency any time they disagree with Congress.
text: Put simply, leaders don’t just shut down the government or declare a national emergency any time they disagree with Congress.

html: And while I’m encouraged Congress was able to come together, I’m concerned w/ POTUS' reported plans to declare a national emergency to build an ineffective, costly border wall he said Mexico would pay for. He's breaking a signature promise & he’s setting a dangerous precedent.
text: And while I’m encouraged Congress was able to come together, I’m concerned w/ POTUS' reported plans to declare a national emergency to build an ineffective, costly border wall he said Mexico would pay for. He's breaking a signature promise & he’s setting a dangerous precedent.

html: Today’s bipartisan agreement achieves two important goals – it keeps our government open and takes critical, effective steps to secure our borders. While the bill isn’t perfect, both sides had to meet in the middle and that’s how governing ought to work. It's what folks expect.
text: Today’s bipartisan agreement achieves two important goals – it keeps our government open and takes critical, effective steps to secure our borders. While the bill isn’t perfect, both sides had to meet in the middle and that’s how governing ought to work. It's what folks expect.

html: The American people sent us here to govern w/ a purpose – not to bicker, but to solve problems. I’ll continue working w/ anyone on either side of the aisle to bring down the cost of health care, to invest in our infrastructure & to clean up the corruption in D.C. #ForThePeople

html: The president spoke at length about bridging divides and healing wounds. I hope these weren’t just lines in a speech – but that he will stick to his word to find common ground and avoid another government shutdown in the coming weeks. #SOTU
text: The president spoke at length about bridging divides and healing wounds. I hope these weren’t just lines in a speech – but that he will stick to his word to find common ground and avoid another government shutdown in the coming weeks. #SOTU

html: And people with pre-existing conditions cannot ‘choose greatness’ when Washington Republicans continue working to rip away their critical patient protections. #ProtectOurCare #SOTU
text: And people with pre-existing conditions cannot ‘choose greatness’ when Washington Republicans continue working to rip away their critical patient protections. #ProtectOurCare #SOTU

html: However, the families we serve deserve real solutions – not just soundbites. Farmers cannot ‘choose greatness’ when the president’s #tradewar is eliminating the very markets where they need to sell their goods. #SOTU
text: However, the families we serve deserve real solutions – not just soundbites. Farmers cannot ‘choose greatness’ when the president’s #tradewar is eliminating the very markets where they need to sell their goods. #SOTU

html: I’m also hopeful we can work together to bring down the cost of prescription drugs for seniors and families and, as the president proposed, make meaningful investments to fight conditions such as childhood cancer. #SOTU
text: I’m also hopeful we can work together to bring down the cost of prescription drugs for seniors and families and, as the president proposed, make meaningful investments to fight conditions such as childhood cancer. #SOTU

html: Pleased tonight’s #SOTU included a commitment to invest in our infrastructure. I’ve worked to bring both parties together on this issue – and @HouseDemocrats are ready w/ a trillion-dollar plan to create jobs & rebuild our crumbling roads, bridges, hospitals, and locks and dams.
text: Pleased tonight’s #SOTU included a commitment to invest in our infrastructure. I’ve worked to bring both parties together on this issue – and @HouseDemocrats are ready w/ a trillion-dollar plan to create jobs & rebuild our crumbling roads, bridges, hospitals, and locks and dams.

html: I asked Mueller—who grows corn, soybeans, and hay, and who raises beef cattle on 750 acres—how his opinion of Trump has changed since 2016. Mueller: "When he was elected, everyone thought he was 'the art of the deal.' And so far, we have not seen any deals happen." #SOTU
text:
I asked Mueller—who grows corn, soybeans, and hay, and who raises beef cattle on 750 acres—how his opinion of Trump has changed since 2016.
Mueller: "When he was elected, everyone thought he was 'the art of the deal.' And so far, we have not seen any deals happen." #SOTU

html: That's just not right. Instead, we should be fighting for policies that open markets for our farmers and reward their hard work – not hinder it. As a member of @HouseAgDems since I first came to Congress, I've always been a strong voice for our family farmers.

html: Soybean farmers across Illinois have felt the impacts of this trade war on their bottom lines. Tom said it best when he stated, “the reckless trade policies coming from the White House seriously threaten the future of family farms like mine.”

html: She was then confronted with costly lease cancellation fees that no family in that situation should face. This legislation fixes this issue and protects Gold Star families by allowing them to terminate residential leases w/o penalty in the wake of a service member’s death. 4/5
text: She was then confronted with costly lease cancellation fees that no family in that situation should face. This legislation fixes this issue and protects Gold Star families by allowing them to terminate residential leases w/o penalty in the wake of a service member’s death. 4/5

html: When I called to give Kylie the news, she told me a heartbreaking story. After her husband's passing, Kylie chose to bring her family back to Illinois from Texas, where he was stationed, to be with the rest of their loved ones. 3/5

html: Kylie’s husband, Sgt. Douglas J. Riney, made the ultimate sacrifice while defending our freedom in Afghanistan in 2016. The Fairview Post Office has since been dedicated to honor his life and bears his name today – after I passed legislation to do so. 2/5pic.twitter.com/yqFthT3goY

html: As the wife of a Sheriff, I know we must keep our communities safe – I’ve always supported both comprehensive immigration reform & effective strategies to secure our borders. But w/ the #TrumpShutdown, border patrol agents aren’t being paid for their work – that’s just wrong!

html: Two weeks ago, there was a bipartisan consensus to fund the government that *every single Senator* agreed to – nearly identical to the legislation we passed today – and I hope they will work with us in good faith to end the shutdown.

html: The President cannot tweet his way out of the shutdown – he needs to work w/ both parties to find solutions. And while he continues to sow chaos at the expense of ordinary Americans, we are committed to governing responsibly #ForThePeople & leading our country out of this mess.

html: Americans deserve better than relentless dysfunction & politicians who are more interested in scoring political points than executing the basic functions of government. I'll continue working to bring both sides together to bring the shutdown to an end as quickly as possible.
text: Americans deserve better than relentless dysfunction & politicians who are more interested in scoring political points than executing the basic functions of government. I'll continue working to bring both sides together to bring the shutdown to an end as quickly as possible.

html: Let’s be clear – this government shutdown, driven by House Republicans and the president, was completely avoidable. Washington’s constant culture of failure and ineffectiveness was on full display this week – and families across the Heartland are understandably frustrated.

text:
Key exchange:

Feinstein: "How are you sure that it was he?"

Ford: "The same way that I'm sure that I'm talking to you right now. Basic memory functions..." 

Feinstein: "Are you telling us this could not be a case of mistaken identity?" 

Ford: "ABSOLUTELY NOT."

html: I worked as a print reporter for 17 years before serving in Congress, so I've seen the news business from both sides. Here's what I know about the #FreePress: 1: In an era when @realDonaldTrump routinely attacks the press as #FakeNews, it's never been harder to be a reporter.
text:
I worked as a print reporter for 17 years before serving in Congress, so I've seen the news business from both sides. Here's what I know about the #FreePress:

1: In an era when @realDonaldTrump routinely attacks the press as #FakeNews, it's never been harder to be a reporter.

html: How harmful are Trump's tariffs for U.S. farmers? In central IL, soybean farmers have lost 20-25% of the value of their beans. The average farmer here expected a net income of $35K this year. Those farms are now “substantially” in the negative.https://www.huffingtonpost.com/entry/trump-tariffs-farmers-soybeans_us_5b646da2e4b0de86f4a0c5f4?p45 …
text:
How harmful are Trump's tariffs for U.S. farmers?

In central IL, soybean farmers have lost 20-25% of the value of their beans. The average farmer here expected a net income of $35K this year.

Those farms are now “substantially” in the negative.https://www.huffingtonpost.com/entry/trump-tariffs-farmers-soybeans_us_5b646da2e4b0de86f4a0c5f4?p45 …

html: As our economy continues to strengthen, we must do more to ensure that workers can take care of their families. To do that, we need to raise wages, health care more affordable, & stop gov’t corruption that worsens inequality.
text: As our economy continues to strengthen, we must do more to ensure that workers can take care of their families.  To do that, we need to raise wages, health care more affordable, & stop gov’t corruption that worsens inequality.

html: In every corner there is a Margaret Hanley trying to build a business & create opportunities for her workers. And across America are workers who have jobs – but those jobs don’t open doors of opportunity like they once did or provide the middle-class life our workers expect.
text: In every corner there is a Margaret Hanley trying to build a business & create opportunities for her workers.  And across America are workers who have jobs – but those jobs don’t open doors of opportunity like they once did or provide the middle-class life our workers expect.

html: In addition to college tuition, she cited homeownership, child care, & retirement savings as opportunities workers today find more & more out of reach.
text: In addition to college tuition, she cited homeownership, child care, & retirement savings as opportunities workers today find more & more out of reach.

html: Margaret said: “My 15 employees are middle-class. They make $30k- $50k a year. But the middle class can’t afford all these investments in themselves. They can make a good living, but the money isn’t there to educate their kids.”
text: Margaret said: “My 15 employees are middle-class. They make $30k- $50k a year. But the middle class can’t afford all these investments in themselves. They can make a good living, but the money isn’t there to educate their kids.”

html: I asked Margaret how her company is faring now, ten years after the Great Recession. I asked whether her workers have access to the kind of opportunities that made it possible for her father and grandfather [who worked at and later owned the business] to get ahead.
text: I asked Margaret how her company is faring now, ten years after the Great Recession.  I asked whether her workers have access to the kind of opportunities that made it possible for her father and grandfather [who worked at and later owned the business] to get ahead.

html: On the #ListeningTour, I sat down with local business owners, educators, and workers and asked them about the challenges they’re facing. One of them was Margaret Hanley, A. Lucas & Sons steel fabricator.
text: On the #ListeningTour, I sat down with local business owners, educators, and workers and asked them about the challenges they’re facing.  One of them was Margaret Hanley, A. Lucas & Sons steel fabricator.

html: I’ve crossed the country to hear directly from Americans about how they are faring in today’s economy. In April, I traveled with @RepCheri Bustos to Peoria. In Peoria, people have been building America, growing America, and making it in America for generations. #MakeItInAmerica

html: If a servicemember makes the ultimate sacrifice, we owe it to them to support their family. That's why I'm introducing this companion bill to provide Gold Star spouses with financial relief by allowing them to terminate a residential lease without penalty. https://www.warren.senate.gov/newsroom/press-releases/senators-unveil-bipartisan-bill-to-protect-surviving-military-spouses- …https://twitter.com/RepCheri/status/1020038257902522369 …
text: If a servicemember makes the ultimate sacrifice, we owe it to them to support their family. That's why I'm introducing this companion bill to provide Gold Star spouses with financial relief by allowing them to terminate a residential lease without penalty. https://www.warren.senate.gov/newsroom/press-releases/senators-unveil-bipartisan-bill-to-protect-surviving-military-spouses- …https://twitter.com/RepCheri/status/1020038257902522369 …

html: Thank you @SenWarren for introducing my bipartisan Gold Star Spouses Leasing Relief Act in the Senate. The families of our fallen heroes have sacrificed far too much, and we should do everything in our power to ensure grieving spouses are able to receive the support they need.
text: Thank you @SenWarren for introducing my bipartisan Gold Star Spouses Leasing Relief Act in the Senate. The families of our fallen heroes have sacrificed far too much, and we should do everything in our power to ensure grieving spouses are able to receive the support they need.
